metadata.name: EvoPets Alpha Series 1
metadata.description: EvoEggs are the first step to having a fully-evolved EvoPet companion. They hatch into EvoPets, which are playable companions in an open world metaverse called Astroverse. The pet you hatch becomes a companion that can accompany and assist you wherever you roam. You can collect new eggs to incubate and hatch these epic EvoPets to add to your collection. Collect and battle them against other players in exclusive EvoPets game modes to level them up and evolve them to maximum levels. They'll gain additional unlockable abilities that might help you in those epic battles against other players.
